answerText: ideal gases[10] Dividing the ideal gas constant by Avogadro's number yields a constant named for this scientist. He proved that entropy equals that constant times the log of the number of microstates.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 2 | 11 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These gases consist of randomly moving point particles that interact only during elastic collisions, and one mole of them has a volume of 22.41 liters at STP.  [10] Identify these hypothetical gases described by the law PV equals nRT.
